name: Conwy - Google
description: Dark, low-contrast, brightness inversion theme for Google apps. Tested on gmail, calendar, sheets, search.
additional_info:
• 2020-02-10: 1.2.15: fix video inversion in Google Meet
  • 2019-12-30: 1.2.14: fix icons in Google Play Music
  • 2019-12-12: 1.2.13: navigation arrow fix in gmail, gsuite logo fix
  • 2019-12-09: 1.2.12: fix for reply and other inline buttons in gmail
  • 1.2.11: fix for a change in avatar class
  • 1.2.10: fix for a change in avatar class
  • 1.2.9: fix for a change in avatar class
  • 1.2.8: restore canvas inversion, as the majority of cases need to be inverted
  • 1.2.7: do not invert images drawn on canvas (e.g. preview in photos)
  • 1.2.6: update avatar class
  • 1.2.5: do not invert avatar in large profile popup
  • 1.2.4: make action icons in contacts visible
  • 1.2.3: do not invert images in photos
  • 1.2.2: exclude google maps
  • 1.2.1: do not invert avatars in gmail address suggestions
  • 1.2.0: dark background on more popups
  • 1.1.0: dark background on more popups; invert G Suite logo

discussions.name: In Hangouts, don't invert emojis, or the background image
In Hangouts, don't invert emojis, or the background image
Works in G-mail and google sheets
